author: danj
msg: Changed groupId on OSGi bundle POMs from muse-osgi to muse.osgi-bundles so that the JARs are installed in
the Maven repository in a hierarchy, w/o having the bundles in a separate top-level group.

author: jstrachan
msg: added the activemq.home system property in case the log4j.property is changed to use files

author: brett
msg: make / direct you straight to the summary page

author: danj
msg: Fix for SimpleMembershipContentRule.isMatch() - made assumption about the existence of a ServiceGroup reference
in order to get the SG's EPR. Change this code to take the SG EPR directly, so it works on server side or
